text:
Does it not work with `dev`?
```(COVID_model) pkg> dev Gnuplot --preserve=all
ERROR: Unable to parse `--preserve=all` as a package.```

elements.text:
(COVID_model) pkg> dev Gnuplot --preserve=all
ERROR: Unable to parse `--preserve=all` as a package.

text: :man-facepalming: it was never hooked up to the REPL, but you can still use it like this `Pkg.develop("Example"; preserve=Pkg.PRESERVE_ALL)`
